summary: PTC (Paid-To-Click) website where users earn $100 per ad watched.
architectural_notes: PTC platform: users earn $100 per ad watched; requires balance tracking and payout logic
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Bold hero banner with gold coins, dollar signs, and a glowing click cursor on a dark navy gradient background (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
- Gold trophy cup icon with sparkle effects on transparent background (trophy-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Stylized dollar sign badge icon with gold and navy colors on transparent background (earn-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a user registration and login system using Internet Identity, storing user profiles (username, email, registration date, balance) in the backend.

Build an ad watching flow: users see a list of available ads, click to watch an ad (displayed in an embedded iframe or video player with a countdown timer matching the ad duration), and after the timer completes a 'Claim Reward' button appears. Clicking it credits $100 to the user's balance. Each ad can only be claimed once per user per day.

Create a user dashboard page showing: total earnings balance, number of ads watched today, total ads watched all-time, daily earnings summary, and a list of recent reward transactions with timestamps.

Implement a withdrawal request system where users can request a payout of their earned balance (minimum withdrawal $500). Requests are stored in the backend with status (pending/approved/rejected). Display withdrawal history in the user dashboard.

Apply a bold, energetic visual theme using rich gold and dark navy colors with modern card-based layouts, glowing accent highlights, and clear call-to-action buttons. Use a clean sans-serif typography hierarchy and enforce the theme consistently across all pages including landing, dashboard, ads list, and withdrawal pages.

Build a public landing page that explains the platform (earn $100 per ad watched), displays key stats (total users, total paid out), and includes a prominent sign-up/login call-to-action using Internet Identity.

new_feature_requests.summary: Ad watching system that rewards $100 per ad view
User dashboard showing earnings and available ads
Ad listing and management for advertisers
Implement an ad listing system where the backend stores available ads (title, description, ad URL, duration in seconds, reward amount set to $100). Provide at least 5 sample ads pre-loaded.
